titleInfo.title: Zooming in on hate – Regional specifics and socio-structural constellations of intergroup conflict and violence targeting refugees in Germany

name.namePart: ISPP's 2020 Annual Meeting - Polarization, Misinformation, and Entrenched Group Conflict: Harnessing Political Psychology to Find Solutions to Problems New and Old
